website_summaries.verdict: Extremely low price for a simple diffuser that will work on many different external camera flash units.
pros: Securely attaches to almost any flash unit with a sturdy elastic strap
Works nicely for simple photography jobs, even for beginners
Very small and flat size, so it can be carried anywhere
Gives you a reflector on the other side of the diffuser for a convenient and inexpensive two-in-one tool
cons: Not made for precise photography work where the light must be perfect

customer_reviews.title: A nice, but not perfect accessory
customer_reviews.text: I have a bin-ful of portable reflector/diffusors. None of them deliver the performance of a larger umbrella or softbox, but work well as a small, portable option. Of my similar bouncers - this one is the easiest to use and attach, and average (or above) at doing the job. I think it's a great compromise - you can probably get a better diffuser (like those big white brand name plastic bulbous things) but you're going to pay many times more - it's up to you. I used this for tight spots, and stands/umbrellas when I have more room and time.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff & Wendy S

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Fits securely on my Canon Speedlite 420EX. Allows me to use bounce flash lighting, rather than much harsher direct flash. I use only the white mat side. I'd be happier if the silver side, which I'll never use, was black just for general appearance. When not on the flash unit it's completely flat and slides easily into the side of my bag. The only reservation I have is that attaches to the flash with a wide elastic strap sewn onto the sides. If the strap stretches out I'll need to replace it. But it's cheap enough that won't be a problem unless it happens too soon.
customer_reviews.author: Sarge

customer_reviews.title: game changer!
customer_reviews.text: This diffuser has been a game changer for me. I'm a real estate photographer and use it to soften the flash and lessen harsh shadows. Huge time saver as I can fix the shadows as I'm shooting instead of trying to edit them out in editing. Only wish I had found it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Good portable bounce card.
customer_reviews.text: Very portable and sufficient when needed. Why fumble for makeshift bouncers and diffusers when you can have one this small and versatile.
customer_reviews.author: J.E.S.

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: It's cheap and does exactly what it's supposed to do. it provide a huge bounce surface. The elastic flat against the white background and it stretch then goes back to flat when you take it off.. I am not sure why the opposite surface is a textured metallic surface.
customer_reviews.author: Rolando JTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: It does the job and a good one at that
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. It does the job and a good one at that. Will recommend the purchase of this item.
customer_reviews.author: ADF

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but good product
customer_reviews.text: The elastic doesn't stretch far enough for some larger flash heads. Simple design that seems to work well otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. There's a strap on both sides for easy installation, too.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Howell

customer_reviews.title: A Good Item for Your Equipment Bag
customer_reviews.text: It's a useful item to have in your equipment bag. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: RJB1207

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied and would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Not very attractive looking on the camera but very well serves its purpose! Satisfied and would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Jolina Linton

product_meta.title: SUPON Flash Speedlite Diffuser softbox Silver/White Reflector for Canon Nikon Pentax Yongnuo and Other and All Speedlight Flashes
product_meta.description:
Suitable for: 
Nikon SB-900, SB-910, SB-800, SB-700, SB-600, SB-80DX, SB28, SB26, SB25, SB24
Canon 600EX-RT, 580EX, 550EX, 540EZ, 430EX, 420EX, 380EX, 430EZ Metz 40MZ2, 54MZ3 
Minolta 5600hs, 5400xi/hx, 5200i, 3600 
O lympus FL-40, FL-50, G40 
S o ny HVL-F1000, HVL-F32X 
Sigma EF-500DG Super, ST 
Nissin 360TW, 360TXP, PZ400-C-N-M 
Sunpak 2000DZ, 266D, MZ440AF 
Tumax 988 
Vivitar 2500, 273, 3500, 850AF 
- Yongnuo YN560 II YN560 III YN560 IV

Package including: 
1xSilver/white flash diffuser
feature_bullets: The Flash Diffuser Reflector is the perfect size and shape and is designed to give you professional looking photos by diffusing harsh, direct light that can cast hard shadows.
For soft indirect flash light use the pure white size. For greater range and spectral highlights use the silver size.
Universal mount fits just about every shoe mount flash on the market, including; Canon, Nikon, Sony models.
It helps to reduce hard background shadows and eliminates the annoying red eye effect.
Integrated velcro strap easily secures around your flash head for a quick and reliable mount, every time.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars25 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
